title: If T'gana govt doesn't honour commitments, Amara Raja may go elsewhere for expansion: Jayadev Galla
description: Amara Raja Energy & Mobility's Chairman, Jayadev Galla, voiced worries about Telangana's financial state and urged the Congress government to fulfill commitments made by the previous BRS government. This comes as Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy tours the US promoting Telangana for investment. Amara Raja's expansion plans depend on the government's ability to honor industrial incentives.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
